name: Ch16BBaseConvo3
_source: speak;Ross;Hey everyone!|Glad to get everyone gathered together!|I know it's been long, but we have grown together a lot!|Remember when we first started fighting?|I could barely swing my axe without losing my balance!
speak;Franz;And now look at you, Ross.|Charging into battle like a seasoned warrior.
speak;Amelia;It's strange to think about...|How much we've all changed since this war began.
speak;Ewan;I used to just follow my sister around and play tricks.|Now I'm conjuring flames and thunder!|Master Saleh would be proud, I think.
speak;Ross;We've all had to grow up quickly.|Sometimes I wonder what my father thinks...|If he sees how much stronger I've become.
speak;Amelia;I still remember how terrified I was in my first battle.|My lance was shaking so badly...
speak;Franz;But you stood your ground, Amelia.|That takes real courage.
speak;Ewan;Do you ever think about what you'll do?|After the war, I mean.
speak;Ross;Keep training, of course!|I'm going to become the greatest warrior in all of Renais!|Just like my father.
speak;Franz;I'll continue serving as a knight.|There will be much to rebuild once peace returns.
speak;Amelia;I want to help protect the people who can't protect themselves.|No one should have to feel as helpless as I once did.
speak;Ewan;I want to keep learning magic!|There's so much more to discover!
speak;Ross;Hey, I have an idea!|Why don't we make a pact? To keep getting stronger together?
speak;Ross;Yeah! Let's each choose something to focus our training on!|Something that will make us better fighters!
speak;Amelia;That sounds like a wonderful idea, Ross!
speak;Ewan;I'm in!|What should we focus on?
choice;TraineeTogetherChoice;What will the young warriors focus on improving?;Strength,Speed,Defense,Magic,Skill;;;;;;;5,1
speak;Ross;Strength! That's what we need!|The stronger we are, the more damage we can deal!
speak;Franz;A knight must be strong to protect others.|I approve of this choice.
speak;Amelia;I'll need to work extra hard...|But I won't fall behind!
speak;Ewan;Hmm, physical strength isn't really my specialty...|But I could strengthen my magical output!
speak;Ross;That's the spirit!|Let's see who can lift the heaviest boulder by the end of the month!
speak;Amelia;Ross, not everything has to be a competition!
speak;Franz;My brother always says that proper form is as important as raw strength.|I could show you all some exercises he taught me.
speak;Ewan;And I found a spell that might help build muscle faster!|It's worth a try, right?
speak;Amelia;Speed would be most useful, I think!|If we're faster than our enemies, we can strike first!
speak;Franz;General Seth always emphasizes the importance of speed in cavalry.|The faster rider often decides the battle before it truly begins.
speak;Ross;My axe is pretty heavy though...|But I guess I could work on swinging it faster!
speak;Ewan;Speed would help me cast spells more quickly too!|Before the enemy can reach me!
speak;Amelia;We could race each other every morning!|Around the camp perimeter!
speak;Franz;I know some footwork drills that would help as well.|My brother taught them to me.
speak;Ross;Last one to finish runs an extra lap!|That'll motivate us!
speak;Ewan;I think I'm going to lose a lot of races...
speak;Franz;Defense should be our priority.|A warrior who cannot withstand enemy attacks won't survive long enough to win.
speak;Amelia;I agree!|My armor has saved me more times than I can count.
speak;Ross;Defense, huh?|My dad always said a good offense is the best defense...
speak;Ewan;I don't wear armor, but there are defensive spells I could learn!|Barriers and shields of magic!
speak;Franz;We could practice blocking techniques together.|Even without armor, proper positioning can save your life.
speak;Amelia;And I could show you how to maintain your armor!|There's a special oil that prevents rust and keeps joints moving smoothly.
speak;Ross;Fine, fine!|I'll work on defense too!|But I'm still going to hit things really hard!
speak;Ewan;Maybe I can find a spell to temporarily harden skin like stone!|That would be amazing!
speak;Ewan;Magic! That's what I vote for!|There's so much potential in the arcane arts!
speak;Amelia;Magic? But I've not sure in my spell casting ability...
speak;Ross;Me neither! I'm not sure my dad would approve...|He's always been about physical strength.
speak;Franz;Actually, understanding magic could be valuable for all of us.|Even if we don't cast spells, knowing how magic works could help us defend against it.
speak;Ewan;Exactly!|I could teach you the basics!|Everyone has at least some magical potential.
speak;Amelia;Could I really learn magic while wearing armor?|That would be incredible!
speak;Ross;Fire magic on my axe...|That would be pretty amazing...
speak;Ewan;We'll start with simple exercises tomorrow!|You'll be surprised what you can do!
speak;Franz;Skill is what separates a soldier from a true knight.|Precision and technique are everything in battle.
speak;Ross;Skill, huh?|I guess it doesn't matter how strong I am if I can't hit anything...
speak;Amelia;General Duessel always said that skill comes from repetition.|The more we practice, the more precise we become!
speak;Ewan;There's skill in magic too!|Focusing your mind, reciting incantations perfectly...|One small mistake and the spell fails!
speak;Franz;We could set up targets and practice hitting specific points.|It's how I trained when I first became a knight.
speak;Ross;I bet I can hit the bullseye more times than any of you!
speak;Amelia;There you go making everything a competition again, Ross!
speak;Ewan;I'm up for that challenge!|Magic can be pretty accurate too, you know!
speak;Ross;It's settled then!|We'll keep training together and become the strongest warriors in the army!
speak;Franz;My brother would be proud to see us taking our training so seriously.
speak;Amelia;We've all come so far from where we started...|But there's still so much more we can achieve!
speak;Ewan;Together!|No one can stop us when we work as a team!
speak;Franz;To protecting those we care about!
